version_description:
Cast to TV - You can now cast your favourite photos & videos from the Drive to your Apple TV, Google Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV.
3D Touch Photos & Videos - In a hurry? Use 3D touch to peek and pop. We now support 3D touch¹ so that you can easily back up, preview folder contents, photos and videos.
3D Touch App icon - Back up with 1-click, right from the App icon.
Live photos - Backup and view Live photos within the App!
¹3D Touch, Live Photos are only available in iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus

Cast to TV - You can now cast your favourite photos & videos from the Drive to your Apple TV, Google Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV.
3D Touch Photos & Videos - In a hurry? Use 3D touch to peek and pop. We now support 3D touch¹ so that you can easily back up, preview folder contents, photos and videos.
3D Touch App icon - Back up with 1-click, right from the App icon.
Live photos - Backup and view Live photos within the App!
¹3D Touch, Live Photos are only available in iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixed a problem that prevented users from uploading to the Drive from the "My Downloads" section
New firmware available through the app. Restart the Drive after installing the update.
New firmware allows you to drag & drop items to the web app (to upload to the Drive)

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Fixed a problem that prevented users from uploading to the Drive from the "My Downloads" section
New firmware available through the app. Restart the Drive after installing the update.
New firmware allows you to drag & drop items to the web app (to upload to the Drive)
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

We have done a lot of improvements in this release.
This release includes the following bug fixes
‣ Fixed a bug that force closed the app for some users when pressing the "+" button
‣ Fixed a bug that made the app to close when playing .flv files for some users
‣ Fixed a bug that prevented camera roll backup from completing
‣ Fixed a bug that prevented some users from saving files to "My Downloads"
‣ Improved the connectivity so that users get quicker feedback when connecting their Drives to home / office Wi-Fi networks.
‣ Improved the time taken to show the Camera roll contents when pressing the "+" button
Enhancements
‣ We now show the number of devices connected to the Drive under Menu > Settings

We have done a lot of improvements in this release.
This release includes the following bug fixes
‣ Fixed a bug that force closed the app for some users when pressing the "+" button
‣ Fixed a bug that made the app to close when playing .flv files for some users
‣ Fixed a bug that prevented camera roll backup from completing
‣ Fixed a bug that prevented some users from saving files to "My Downloads"
‣ Improved the connectivity so that users get quicker feedback when connecting their Drives to home / office Wi-Fi networks.
‣ Improved the time taken to show the Camera roll contents when pressing the "+" button
Enhancements
‣ We now show the number of devices connected to the Drive under Menu > Settings
A number of performance and stability enhancements
A number of performance and stability enhancements
A number of performance and stability enhancements
A number of performance and stability enhancements

- Improved backup featurs! You can now backup photos only, videos only or both. Photos will be backed up to 'Photos' folder and videos will be backed up to 'Videos' folder.
- A number of performance and stability enhancements.

- Improved backup featurs! You can now backup photos only, videos only or both. Photos will be backed up to 'Photos' folder and videos will be backed up to 'Videos' folder.
- A number of performance and stability enhancements.
